> How do I make a boot USB stick so that I can choose whether to start the installation of a Windows system or start GParted?
Start here:  
[http://www.msfn.org/...s-usb-f157.html](http://www.msfn.org/board/install-windows-usb-f157.html "External link")  

Several different methods to choose among.  

Then check here:  
[http://www.boot-land...hp?showforum=66](http://www.boot-land.net/forums/index.php?showforum=66 "External link")  

Particularly here:  
[http://www.boot-land...?showtopic=5041](http://www.boot-land.net/forums/index.php?showtopic=5041 "External link")  

Cannot say about Gparted, usually Pmagic is used:  
[http://www.boot-land...?...ic=9577\&hl=](http://www.boot-land.net/forums/index.php?showtopic=9577&hl= "External link")  

And please do use the SEARCH function of the board or google, you would have found the above easily.  

jaclaz
